Footer.description: აღმოაჩინეთ თქვენი ოცნების ცხოვრება მონტენეგროში. მზა ახალი ცხოვრება.
Footer.ctaTitle: მოდით ერთად ავაშენოთ თქვენი ოცნების ცხოვრება
Footer.ctaSubtitle: მიიღეთ უფასო კონსულტაცია თქვენი პროექტისთვის. ბედნიერები ვართ გისმენთ.
Footer.brandBlurb: აღმოაჩინეთ თქვენი ოცნების ცხოვრება მონტენეგროში. მზა ახალი ცხოვრება.

Kurumsal.pageLead: With our story since 2014 at N.and.D Construction, we build dozens of projects and thousands of lives.

paragraphs.bizKimiz: N.and.D Construction Company is a real estate development company located in Dobro Vodo, Bar, Montenegro, offering sea-view residential projects. Our Seafeild Residence and Asis Adriatic projects offer investors properties that gain value throughout the long summer season.
paragraphs.misyon: Our mission is to offer our investors sustainable, value-adding real estate opportunities in Montenegro with high long-term returns.
paragraphs.vizyon: Our vision is to make the Montenegrin coast a hub for international investors by developing modern and innovative projects.

Projeler.heading: Our projects
Projeler.lead: Discover premium living and investment value in Montenegro.

0.title: Seafield Residences
0.description: A prestigious project in Bar, Montenegro, with Adriatic views; premium residential experience.

1.title: Asis Adriatic
1.description: A premium investment project with modern design and coastal location.

seafield.nedenText: Seafeild Residence is a prestigious residential project in Bar, Montenegro, with stunning Adriatic sea views.

paragraphs.1: We introduce you to Montenegro's most prestigious projects.

Iletisim.heading: Contact
Iletisim.subHeading: We are here to get in touch with you. Fill in the form and we will get back to you.
Iletisim.paragraph: Perhaps you took the first step, but how about taking the second step together? We invite you to have us by your side as you make your dreams come true.
